author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
#### PR description:

Needed updates for L1T CondFormat classes for updated external library UMT v_0.8_1 or v_0.8.0.

#### PR validation:

Needs UTM v_0.8.1 installed (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/6340)



#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

backport of cms-sw/cmssw#32020
title: (Backport 11_1_X) L1T CondFormats classes updates for UTM v_0.8.1 (v_0.8.0)
